story: Narcissus, a beautiful young man, spurns all suitors, including the nymph Echo.
Cursed by Nemesis for his arrogance, he falls in love with his own reflection in a pool.
The wicked queen, consumed by vanity, consults her magic mirror daily, asking who is the fairest.
Its truthful answers fuel her jealousy of Snow White, leading to her destructive schemes and ultimate downfall.
Oshun, goddess of love, admires her beauty in a river’s reflection, speaking affirmations to enhance her charm.
Her vanity stirs rivalry with other deities, but her wisdom balances her allure, earning her adoration.
